oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agribio II: Farming systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This part of the program (1 project) is about multidimensional analysis and accompaniment of trajectories of conversion in organic and mixed farming horticultural farms .
